entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
